thread.section_title: Midphase Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Midphase | www.midphase.com
thread.title: William Smith

author: William Smith
title: William Smith
text:
I set up a domain because I didn't want to use Medium.com as my main blog platform. Wordpress was intuitive to me so I just needed easy hosting that had the option of installing that on the main domain you register.
Midphase made it possible to set up a Wordpress site in less than an hour, and there's other features I haven't had the chance to check out yet. But for me setting up Wordpress was my main need.
